Does anyone know of a NumericUpDown, aka. "spinner" (ie. a TextBox with an up and a down button, and displaying and modifying an integer value) for WPF?

google found me this one: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms771573.aspx
But it doesn't seem to be complete.  Ie. the buttons aren't wired up to the TextBox value.

Thanx!


- Steinar

We will be releasing one here on CodePlex in the near future along with a bunch of other controls :-)

-Eric Fabricant, MSFT

Look for AvalonControl Library on the NET : This is free code with source and it has a spinner like you want.

Hope it helps !

Xavier, thanx for the tip.
